question: Would like to know whether the name Haya Rabeea is an acceptable muslim name. If it is acceptable then what is the meaning of Haya Rabeea
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamualikum, I am writing in behalf of our family friend. Our family friend has a baby daughter name Haya Rabeea, who was born on May 30th, 2003 at 8:45 pm. Mashallah Haya is a healthy baby but every now and then she develops health related problem. Which worries to parents. Parents would like to know whether the name Haya Rabeea is an acceptable muslim name. If it is acceptable then what is the meaning of Haya Rabeea. Parents are considering to change the first name of the baby to one of the following names: .Safa Rabeea, Aisha Rabeea, Imaan Rabeea Please advice us with your suggestion. For your information Haya is the firstname of the baby. Jazakallah
ANSWER


Share:
Haya ? shame, modesty.
Rabeea - Fourth; name of a saint who lived in Basrah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
